comments:
Build id: 200411010800

I did a synchronization on my workspace and Eclipse asked me for my password for
ottcvs1 after it had synchronized my projects from dev.eclipse.org, for which I
don't use a password (being anonymous). I entered it, the synchronization
continued and as soon as it was finished I got a dialog 'Error' and a
StackOverflowError in my log. The synchronization seemed to be valid after the
error, and I seem to have entered my password correctly as another attempt to
synchronize performed smoothly.

Here's what I found in the log:
